title: Panjim Footballers
text:
Panjim Footballers Football Club, or simply known as Panjim Footballers, is an Indian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Panjim">Panjim</a>, <a href="Goa">Goa</a>, that competes in the <a href="Goa%20Professional%20League">Goa Professional League</a>. It's women's team previously participated in the <a href="Indian%20Women%27s%20League">Indian Women's League</a>.
History.
Established in 1978 as an small city club Panjim Footballers started playing in inter-village tournaments and GFA age-group tournaments and won many small tournaments.
In 2021 Panjim Footballers won <a href="Goa%20Police%20Cup">Goa Police Cup</a>, their only major tournament since their inception in 1978. They defeated <a href="Dempo%20SC">Dempo SC</a> 1-0 at <a href="Duler%20Stadium">Duler Stadium</a> in the final.
